short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JobApplyBot.Com: Your Personal Job Application Assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JobApplyBot.Com is a Chrome extension designed to simplify and streamline your job search. With just a few clicks, JobApplyBot.Com automates the application process on LinkedIn Jobs and ZipRecruiter.Com, saving you valuable time and effort.
